definition: Bo Le (horse connoisseur during Spring and Autumn Period)/a good judge of talent/talent scout
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
lit. there are many swift horses, but very few who can spot them (idiom)/fig. many have talent, but few can recognize talent when they see it
pinyin: qian1 li3 ma3 chang2 you3 , er2 Bo2 Le4 bu4 chang2 you3
containing_words.word: 千里馬常有，而伯樂不常有

sentences.english: Later, people in charge of the sky with stars Ma Bole to call him names.
sentences.chinese: 後來人們就用天上掌馬星伯樂的名字來稱呼他。

sentences.english: Is Hanhan's "Lottery Agency" a talent scout or merely the commercial speculation?

sentences.english: We were farmers in Jonesboro, Ark., on 114 acres of land.

sentences.english: Boles would like to borrow your eyes, I begin with a single step away trip.

sentences.english: Bretschneideraceae is reported as new record from Hainan province, China.
